newsitem.title: FRANCE: Valeo says report of Shanghai engine JV erroneous.
newsitem.headline: Valeo says report of Shanghai engine JV erroneous.

text.p: French auto components maker Valeo said on Thursday that a Reuter report saying Valeo International DV had signed a $49.9 million joint venture deal to produce car engines with Shanghai Automotive Electrical Works was erroneous.
A Valeo spokesman in Paris said the joint venture with the Shanghai firm had been announced in July of last year and that it concerned starters for cars, rather than engines.
He also said that the venture was 30 percent owned by Valeo and 70 percent by the Shanghai partner.

The Reuter story out of Shanghai reported an official with the venture as saying the two sides had signed a venture to produce car engines for small cars at a new plant being built in the Pudong New Area to the east of central Shanghai.
